title: Surround Lighted Glamour Mirror 1X/5X - MODEL: GLA75
description:
Luxuriously beautiful.

Cutting-edge technology meets elegant design with Zadro's Glamour Mirror. On one side, the 5X magnification is great for viewing up close in detail while still allowing you to see your entire face. On the other side, the 1X magnification is perfect for all-around hairstyling, cosmetics, and every beauty need in between.

No matter how dim the environment, the dual-sided, powerfully bright fluorescent light reproduces the effects of natural sunlight to illuminate your entire face. Also, an infinity dimmer switch is located at the base to soften and control the brightness levels for easier viewing on your eyes.

Available in a Polished Nickel finish.

Features:

• 12” Dual Sided Mirror with Optical Quality Glass
• Surround Light Fluorescent "Natural Daylight"
• 270° Swivel Mirror Head with Rotational Stop
• Dual-Sided 5X and 1X Magnification
• Even Light Dispersion at Any Angle and Glare Free
• Infinity Dimmer Switch
• Polished Nickel Finish
• Polarized Wall Plug
• Patented

transcripts: Cutting-edge technology meets elegant design with Zadro Glamour vanity mirror. Measuring in at 12 inches in diameter this is the largest lighted vanity mirror on the market today. An infinity dimmer switch is located at the base of the mirror to soften and control the brightness levels for easier viewing on your eyes. This switch also allows you to turn the mirror on and off, no matter how dim the environment the powerful dual sided fluorescent light reproduces the effects of natural sunlight to fully illuminate your entire face. Patented design allows for even light dispersion at any angle also enabling it to be glare free. The glamour vanity mirror rotates 270 degrees allowing you to swivel into your preferred viewing angle. This dual sided vanity mirror features two magnifications and optical quality glass. One side the five-time magnification is great for viewing up close in detail while still allowing you to see your entire face. On the other side the one time magnification is perfect for all around hair styling cosmetics and every beauty need in between. This one-of-a-kind mirror is corded and comes in a sleek polished nickel finish.
